title: Between the Lines
description: An unspoken rule. A friendship that will be tested.  Quinn He was my crush at thirteen and ten years later that feeling never ceased. I thought that time and distance would change us but I never expected the feelings to grow. Now things are complicated His sister is my best friend. She’s also his twin. And I’m stuck in the middle.  Trevor She was always my fantasy come to life and I knew even at sixteen that girls like her were rare. Soft, feminine, sweet to her core - she was my complete opposite. I knew how to keep her away when we were young, but I’m finding it hard to keep her out of reach when everyone is pushing us together. My sister can never know the things I plan to do to her best friend.
author: Renee Harless
